book.title: The Code Breaker
book.author: Walter Isaacson
book.description: The story of CRISPR and gene editing technology.

book.title: Deep Learning
book.author: Ian Goodfellow
book.description: An introduction to the principles and practices of deep learning.

book.title: The Silent Patient
book.author: Alex Michaelides
book.description: A psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after a traumatic incident.

book.title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
book.author: V.E. Schwab
book.description: The story of a woman who makes a deal to live forever but is forgotten by everyone she meets.

book.title: Educated
book.author: Tara Westover
book.description: A memoir about growing up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho and finding the courage to leave and pursue an education.

book.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
book.author: Delia Owens
book.description: A mystery and coming-of-age novel about a young girl who grows up isolated in the marshlands of North Carolina.

book.title: Becoming
book.author: Michelle Obama
book.description: The former First Lady's memoir, chronicling her life from childhood through her years in the White House.

book.title: The Vanishing Half
book.author: Brit Bennett
book.description: A novel about twin sisters who grow up in a small, southern black community and choose to live in two very different worlds, one black and one white.

book.title: Atomic Habits
book.author: James Clear
book.description: A guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones with practical strategies.

book.title: Circe
book.author: Madeline Miller
book.description: A retelling of the story of Circe, the enchantress from Homer's Odyssey, from her own perspective.

book.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
book.author: Mark Manson
book.description: A self-help book that challenges conventional wisdom about happiness and success.

book.title: Little Fires Everywhere
book.author: Celeste Ng
book.description: A novel about a wealthy family and a mother-daughter pair who upend their lives.

book.title: The Goldfinch
book.author: Donna Tartt
book.description: A young boy in New York City miraculously survives an accident that takes his mother's life and is taken in by a wealthy family.

book.title: The Night Circus
book.author: Erin Morgenstern
book.description: A fantasy novel about a magical competition between two young illusionists.

book.title: The Silent Corner
book.author: Dean Koontz
book.description: An FBI agent goes rogue to investigate her husband's death and uncovers a conspiracy.

book.title: The Outsider
book.author: Stephen King
book.description: A horror novel about the investigation of a brutal murder that begins to question reality itself.

book.title: The Immortalists
book.author: Chloe Benjamin
book.description: A novel about four siblings who learn the dates of their deaths and how it shapes their lives.

book.title: The Woman in the Window
book.author: A.J. Finn
book.description: A psychological thriller about an agoraphobic woman who believes she witnessed a crime in her neighbor's house.

book.title: The Light We Lost
book.author: Jill Santopolo
book.description: A love story about a couple who meet on September 11, 2001, and the choices they make over the years.

book.title: The Tattooist of Auschwitz
book.author: Heather Morris
book.description: The true story of the tattooist of Auschwitz and the woman he loved.

book.title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
book.author: Daniel Kahneman
book.description: A groundbreaking book about human thinking and decision-making processes.

book.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
book.author: Yuval Noah Harari
book.description: A narrative of humanity's creation and evolution that explores the ways in which biology and history have defined us.

book.title: The Power of Habit
book.author: Charles Duhigg
book.description: An exploration of the science behind habits and how we can change them.

book.title: Grit: The Power of Passion and Perseverance
book.author: Angela Duckworth
book.description: A book that argues that the secret to outstanding achievement is not talent but a special blend of passion and persistence.

book.title: Bad Blood: Secrets and Lies in a Silicon Valley Startup
book.author: John Carreyrou
book.description: The inside story of the rise and fall of Theranos, the one-time multibillion-dollar biotech startup.

book.title: How to Win Friends and Influence People
book.author: Dale Carnegie
book.description: A classic book on how to improve your relationships and achieve success in life.

book.title: Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can't Stop Talking
book.author: Susan Cain
book.description: A book that explores the strengths and contributions of introverts in a society that celebrates extroversion.

book.title: The Lean Startup
book.author: Eric Ries
book.description: A guide to lean startup principles and practices that help entrepreneurs build successful businesses.

book.title: The Four Agreements
book.author: Don Miguel Ruiz
book.description: A practical guide to personal freedom based on ancient Toltec wisdom.

book.title: The 5 Love Languages
book.author: Gary Chapman
book.description: A book that helps people understand and speak their partner's love language to build stronger relationships.

book.title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
book.author: Stephen R. Covey
book.description: A principle-centered approach for solving personal and professional problems.

book.author: Daniel Kahneman
book.description: A groundbreaking book about human thinking and decision-making processes.
